item.name: Feature specification
item.hint: What qualitative properties does entity X have? e.g. What does the graph of X look like?

item.name: Quantification
item.hint: What is the value of a quantitative variable? How much? e.g. What is the solution of the following equation? e.g. How many solutions does a linear equation have? e.g. How many solutions can a quadratic equation have? e.g. What is the discriminant of this quadratic polynomial? e.g. What is the maximum number of turning points that a polynomial of degree X can have?

item.name: Definition questions
item.hint: What does X mean? e.g. Define what it means for an equation to be linear. e.g. Give the standard form of a parabola. e.g. Define what it means for an equation to be exponential.

item.name: Comparison
item.hint: How is X similar to Y? How is X different from Y?
